Subject: Erotica in Speculative Fiction
Description: Birds do it, bees do it, and elves and aliens do it. Our panelists talk about erotica in science fiction and fantasy genre fiction.  Speakers include:Ken MacGregor, Jay Maynard, Nicole Castle, Dave Klecha - Track: Literature  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Evoking Emotions, Provoking Readers
Description: Creating authentic characters who seem to experience a full range of believable emotions is only half the equation in character-building.  How can we use character emotions to evoke real feelings in our readers? What other tricks are there?  Speakers include:Merrie Haskell, Cindy Spencer Pape, Ken MacGregor, Catherynne Valente, Mark Oshiro - Track: Literature  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Pupal Writers Panel
Description: You've written a bit, you've published a bit, now what?  Speakers include:Jen Haeger, Christian Klaver, Ken MacGregor, Christopher Purrett, Janice Leach - Track: Literature  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none
